minTipAmount.descr: Minimum tip amount in microALGO (default: 100_000 = 0.1 ALGO)

platformFeeBps.descr: Platform fee percentage in basis points (100 = 1%)

totalTipsProcessed.descr: Total tips processed through the platform (in microALGO)

revSplitAddress.descr: Revenue split: collaborator address (empty = no split)

revSplitPercent.descr: Revenue split: percentage for collaborator (0-50, in percent)

tipsReceived.descr: Total tips received by this creator (in microALGO)

contract.name: TipJar
contract.desc:
TipJar - Content Creator Tip Jar Smart Contract (Production)

A production-grade tipping platform for content creators on Algorand.
Creators register profiles and supporters send ALGO tips as appreciation.

Features:
- Creator registration with name and bio
- Accept ALGO tips from supporters
- Track total tips and tip count per creator
- Minimum tip enforcement
- Platform fee support with admin withdrawal
- NFT appreciation badges for top supporters (Bronze/Silver/Gold/Diamond)
- Smart contract-based revenue split with collaborators
- On-chain tipping record verification
- Contract pause/unpause (circuit breaker)
- Admin transfer with 2-step confirmation
- Input length validation against local state limits
- Event logging for off-chain indexing
- Min balance protection on withdrawals

methods.name: createApplication
methods.desc:
Initialize the contract - called on creation
Sets the admin to the creator of the contract

methods.name: pauseContract
methods.desc:
Admin: Pause the contract (circuit breaker)
Prevents registrations, tips, badge minting, and revenue split changes

methods.name: transferAdmin
methods.desc:
Admin: Initiate admin transfer (2-step)
Step 1: Current admin proposes a new admin

methods.name: acceptAdmin
methods.desc:
Admin Transfer Step 2: New admin accepts the role
Must be called by the pending admin address

methods.name: setRevenueSplit
methods.desc: Configure revenue split with a collaborator

methods.name: getRevenueSplitPercent
methods.desc: Get revenue split config for a creator

methods.name: sendTip

args.name: tipPayment
args.desc: - The payment transaction for the tip

methods.desc:
Send a tip to a creator - must be accompanied by a payment transaction
Revenue split is automatically applied if configured

methods.name: mintBadge

args.name: creatorAddr
args.desc: - The creator this badge is for

methods.desc:
Mint an NFT appreciation badge for a supporter
Badge tier is determined by total amount tipped to a specific creator

methods.name: verifyTipRecord
methods.desc:
Verify a tipping record on-chain
Returns the tip count and total tips for a creator (verifiable proof)

methods.name: getTipsReceived
methods.desc: Get total tips received by a creator

methods.name: getTipCount
methods.desc: Get tip count for a creator

methods.name: getTotalCreators
methods.desc: Get total number of registered creators

args.name: newMin
args.desc: - New minimum tip amount in microALGO (must be >= 10_000 = 0.01 ALGO)

args.name: newFeeBps
args.desc: - New fee in basis points (100 = 1%, max 1000 = 10%)

methods.name: withdrawPlatformFees
methods.desc:
Admin: Withdraw accumulated platform fees
Protects minimum contract balance (MBR + 0.1 ALGO)

methods.name: checkRegistration
methods.desc: Check if an account is a registered creator

methods.name: getPlatformFee
methods.desc: Get platform fee in basis points
